Hola! Bienvenidos a mi primera entrada de blog. Chile's ENP!

```{r leaflet-map, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(stringi)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(RColorBrewer)

# 1. Load CSV
data <- read.csv("/Users/mathieurojas/Documents/Electoral Data/Chile_Effective_Number_of_Parties/Chile_Presidenciales_Final.csv")

# 2. Clean and reshape
replacements <- c(
  "CABO DE HORNOS(EX-NAVARINO)" = "CABO DE HORNOS",
  "AISEN" = "AYSEN",
  "LLAY-LLAY" = "LLAILLAY",
  "TREHUACO" = "TREGUACO"
)

data <- data %>%
  filter(Unit == "Municipality") %>%
  mutate(
    Unit_ID = stri_trans_general(Unit_ID, "Latin-ASCII"),
    Unit_ID = recode(Unit_ID, !!!replacements)
  ) %>%
  pivot_wider(
    id_cols = Unit_ID,
    names_from = Year,
    values_from = ENP,
    names_prefix = "ENP_"
  )

# 3. Load geojson
urls <- paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/caracena/chile-geojson/master/", 1:16, ".geojson")
geojson <- urls %>% map(st_read, quiet = TRUE) %>% bind_rows()

geojson <- geojson %>%
  mutate(
    Comuna = stri_trans_general(Comuna, "Latin-ASCII") %>% toupper()
  )

# 4. Join data
Comunas_ENP <- geojson %>% left_join(data, by = c("Comuna" = "Unit_ID"))

# 5. Ensure numeric
Comunas_ENP$ENP_2021 <- as.numeric(Comunas_ENP$ENP_2021)
Comunas_ENP$ENP_2017 <- as.numeric(Comunas_ENP$ENP_2017)
Comunas_ENP$ENP_2013 <- as.numeric(Comunas_ENP$ENP_2013)

# 6. Palette
pal <- colorNumeric("YlOrRd", domain = c(Comunas_ENP$ENP_2013, Comunas_ENP$ENP_2017, Comunas_ENP$ENP_2021))

# 7. Leaflet map with layers
leaflet(Comunas_ENP) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  
  addPolygons(
    fillColor   = ~pal(ENP_2021),
    color       = "white",
    weight      = 0.3,
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    popup       = ~paste0("<b>", Comuna, "</b><br/>ENP 2021: ", ENP_2021),
    group       = "ENP 2021"
  ) %>%
  
  addPolygons(
    fillColor   = ~pal(ENP_2017),
    color       = "white",
    weight      = 0.3,
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    popup       = ~paste0("<b>", Comuna, "</b><br/>ENP 2017: ", ENP_2017),
    group       = "ENP 2017"
  ) %>%
  
  addPolygons(
    fillColor   = ~pal(ENP_2013),
    color       = "white",
    weight      = 0.3,
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    popup       = ~paste0("<b>", Comuna, "</b><br/>ENP 2013: ", ENP_2013),
    group       = "ENP 2013"
  ) %>%
  
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("ENP 2021", "ENP 2017", "ENP 2013"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  ) %>%
  
  addLegend(
    "bottomright",
    pal    = pal,
    values = c(Comunas_ENP$ENP_2013, Comunas_ENP$ENP_2017, Comunas_ENP$ENP_2021),
    title  = "ENP",
    opacity = 0.8
  )
```
